sense.name: observance
sense.commentary: CEREMONY[+event] ceremonial, ceremonial occasion, observance - a formal event performed on a special occasion
sense.examples: A ceremony commemorating Pearl Harbor was held in the park. An inaugural ceremony will be held on Tuesday.

sense.name: overproduction
sense.commentary: CEREMONY[+event] any activity that is performed in an especially solemn elaborate or formal way
sense.examples: The ceremony of smelling the cork and tasting the wine. He makes a ceremony of addressing his golf ball. He disposed on it without ceremony.
